item.title: Changes to Sexual Identity Response Options in the Youth Risk Behavior Survey - July 2023
item.description: For the 2021 YRBS, the CDC expanded how they capture sexual identity data. Our team explores this change and provides recommendations for consistent reporting in JAMA Pediatrics.

item.title: The Strengths and Limitations of Queer Data - July 2023
item.description: Kevin Guyan, the author of “Queer Data: Using Gender, Sex and Sexuality Data for Action” and I discuss who gets to be in the room to tell our stories, who should be in the room, and how to highlight queer joy within data.

item.title: Native American Students & LGBTQ+ Identity - Dec. 2023
Findings from the 2019 Youth Risk Behavior Survey - December 2022
The Double-Edged Sword of Queer Data - June 2022
item.description: My piece for the American Evaluation Association discussing the pros and cons of LGBTQ+ data collection.

item.title: Dikayo Data Podcast - July 2020
item.description: My guest appearance on Dikayo Data’s S2E2 of her #DataFemme podcast alongside Jeremy Mason and Kalan Dawson to discuss bias in machine learning models, reconciling faulty data, and queer representation in tech.

item.title: Data Mishaps Night - Feb. 2021
item.description: I spoke at the inaugural Data Mishaps Night on some of the classic ways data analysis can go wrong!

item.title: Using R to Land the Job: A Resume-Building Tutorial using Pagedown - May 2020
item.description: My talk “Using R to Land the Job: A Resume-Building Tutorial using Pagedown”, presented at SatRday Chicago 2020 virtual conference.
